metadata.title: CVE-2025-24368 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is an open source performance and fault management framework. Some ofthe data stored in automation_tree_rules.php is not thoroughly checked andis used to concatenate the SQL statement in build_rule_item_filter()function from lib/api_automation.php, resulting in SQL injection. Thisvulnerability is fixed in 1.2.29.

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
